data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, San’An, Nan, Nan (2012): Neogreenia lonicera sp. nov., a new species of Margarodidae sensu lato (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) from China, with a key to species of Neogreenia MacGillivray and placement of the genus in the family Kuwaniidae. Zootaxa 3274: 43-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212171
